description:
Chico C Hammitt is the daughter of the owner of Fairy Hills, Ruchio. She is a former Mage of the Fairy Tail Guild.
Her magic allowes her to collect the wandering souls within Magnolia Town, she can use them for combat. However, if she steps out of Magnolia, even for one second, she has to recollect all the souls again.
Source: Fairy Tail Wiki
name: Chico C Hammitt
